function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of consideration for the impact of remote work and online activities on mental and social wellbeing.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Migration from urban to rural areas due to lack of space in multi-family housing","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of user participation in decision-making regarding housing issues","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate user participation in the design process","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for societal changes and future challenges in the design","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inflow of rural population into urban areas","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of urban and architectural concepts","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to spend free time outdoors in smaller, controlled groups","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of communal and social spaces within housing projects","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting a survey and collecting data from 170 individual respondents during a pandemic","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey includes a mix of urban and suburban residents, potentially representing different levels of exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Struggle to organize adequate work/study space in living environment","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of vacation mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference for living in houses over apartments","category":"Cultural and Lifestyle Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Living in an apartment during the mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate open and closed spaces for gatherings and social interaction","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creating
